de.systemagmbh.common.io.reader
Class CSysCommentReader

java.lang.Object
  de.systemagmbh.common.io.reader.CSysCommentReader
Direct Known Subclasses:
CSysTextReader
Deprecated. As of release 2.5, deprecated without substitution

public class CSysCommentReader
extends Object

A CSysCommentReader reads commented Text. Single line comments and multiline comments are supported. This class will accept nearly any notation, but you have to specify the delimiter before starting to read.
Usage: The following fragment throws out Pascal-type comments from Text files or stdin (depending on a filename provided or not). Result is written to stdout. 

        public static void main (String[] args)
        {
                CSysCommentReader atr=null;
                String s="";			
                try
                {
                        if (args.length==0)
                        {
                                atr=new CSysCommentReader(System.in);
                        }
                        else
                        {
                                atr=new CSysCommentReader(args[0]);
                        }
                        atr.addRangeCommentMarker ("(*","*)");
                        atr.addRangeCommentMarker ("{","}");
//			atr.addEndLineCommentMarker ("//");
                        do 
                        {
                                s=atr.readLine();
                                if (s!=null) System.out.println(s);
                        } while (null!=s);
                }
                catch (Exception ex)
                {
                        ex.printStackTrace();
                        System.exit(1);
                }
        }

addRangeCommentMarker

public void addRangeCommentMarker(String start,
                                  String stop)
Deprecated. 
Add another group of start and end signs for comments. CSysCommentReader.readLine() will not return text within comments.

Parameters:
start - the comment start e.g "(*"

addEndLineCommentMarker

public void addEndLineCommentMarker(String start)
Deprecated. 
Add another start sign for line comments. CSysCommentReader.readLine() will not return text after line comment signs .

Parameters:
start - the comment start e.g "#"
